original_text: Many people had a debt that they had not paid back to the master. So the servant told those people to come to him. He asked the first man, “How big is your debt to my master?”
korean_text: 주인에게 빚진 자를 일일이 불러다가 먼저 온 자에게 이르되 네가 내 주인에게 얼마나 빚졌느냐

sentences.original_text: that they had not paid back to the master
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 주인에게 갚지 않은 빚이 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: So the servant told those people
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그 종은 그 사람들에게 말했습니다

sentences.original_text: How big is your debt to my master?
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 주인에게 당신의 빚은 얼마나 큽니까?
